text: int n ; int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int * a ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int i ; a = ( int * ) malloc ( ( n + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } int min , j ; min = a [ 0 ] ; for ( j = 1 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ j ] < min ) { min = a [ j ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , min * ( n - 1 ) ) ; free ( a ) ; } return 0 ; }
